question: The Guru Ghasidas National Park is located in which district of Chhattisgarh?
explanation: The Chhattisgarh government has decided to declare Guru Ghasidas National Park in the Korea district as a tiger reserve. Presently the state has three tiger reserves viz. Indravati in Bijapur district, Udanti-Sitanadi in Gariaband and Achanakmar in Bilaspur.
